commands.statement:
DECLARE v_exists NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) INTO v_exists FROM user_tables WHERE table_name = 'REPOSITORYFILE';
IF v_exists = 0 THEN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' CREATE TABLE "REPOSITORYFILE" ( "ItemID" VARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL, "RepositoryID" VARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL, "DependencyID" VARCHAR2(32), "FileName" NVARCHAR2(256) NOT NULL, "PhysicalPath" NVARCHAR2(1000), "AbsolutePath" NVARCHAR2(1000), "RelativePath" NVARCHAR2(1000), "Extension" VARCHAR2(50), "Size" NUMBER(19,0), "MD5" VARCHAR2(50), "CustomPath1" VARCHAR2(50), "CustomPath2" VARCHAR2(50), "CustomPath3" VARCHAR2(50), "PolicyPath" VARCHAR2(10), "SortingNo" NUMBER(10,0), "Comment" NVARCHAR2(200), "CreatedMemberNo" VARCHAR2(32), "CreatedAt" DATE, CONSTRAINT "PK_REPOSITORYFILE" PRIMARY KEY ("ItemID") )'; EXECUTE IMMEDIATE ' CREATE INDEX "IX_REPOSITORYFILE" ON "REPOSITORYFILE" ( "RepositoryID" ASC, "DependencyID" ASC )'; END IF; END; /

SELECT RF."ItemID" , RF."RepositoryID" , RF."DependencyID" , RF."FileName" , RF."PhysicalPath" , RF."AbsolutePath" , RF."RelativePath" , RF."Extension" , RF."Size" , RF."MD5" , RF."CustomPath1" , RF."CustomPath2" , RF."CustomPath3" , RF."PolicyPath" , RF."SortingNo" , RF."Comment" , RF."CreatedMemberNo" , TO_CHAR(RF."CreatedAt", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AS "CreatedAt" FROM "RepositoryFile" RF WHERE RF."RepositoryID" = :RepositoryID AND RF."ItemID" = :ItemID;

SELECT RF."ItemID" , RF."RepositoryID" , RF."DependencyID" , RF."FileName" , RF."PhysicalPath" , RF."AbsolutePath" , RF."RelativePath" , RF."Extension" , RF."Size" , RF."MD5" , RF."CustomPath1" , RF."CustomPath2" , RF."CustomPath3" , RF."PolicyPath" , RF."SortingNo" , RF."Comment" , RF."CreatedMemberNo" , TO_CHAR(RF."CreatedAt", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AS "CreatedAt" FROM "RepositoryFile" RF WHERE RF."RepositoryID" = :RepositoryID AND NVL(:DependencyID, RF."DependencyID") = :DependencyID;

MERGE INTO "RepositoryFile" T USING ( SELECT :ItemID AS ItemID, :RepositoryID AS RepositoryID FROM dual ) S ON (S.ItemID = T.ItemID AND S.RepositoryID = T.RepositoryID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T."DependencyID" = :DependencyID, T."FileName" = :FileName, T."PhysicalPath" = :PhysicalPath, T."AbsolutePath" = :AbsolutePath, T."RelativePath" = :RelativePath, T."Extension" = :Extension, T."Size" = :Size, T."MD5" = :MD5, T."CustomPath1" = :CustomPath1, T."CustomPath2" = :CustomPath2, T."CustomPath3" = :CustomPath3, T."PolicyPath" = :PolicyPath, T."SortingNo" = :SortingNo, T."Comment" = :Comment, T."CreatedMemberNo" = :CreatedMemberNo WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (T."ItemID" , T."RepositoryID" , T."DependencyID" , T."FileName" , T."PhysicalPath" , T."AbsolutePath" , T."RelativePath" , T."Extension" , T."Size" , T."MD5" , T."CustomPath1" , T."CustomPath2" , T."CustomPath3" , T."PolicyPath" , T."SortingNo" , T."Comment" , T."CreatedMemberNo" , T."CreatedAt") VALUES (:ItemID , :RepositoryID , :DependencyID , :FileName , :PhysicalPath , :AbsolutePath , :RelativePath , :Extension , :Size , :MD5 , :CustomPath1 , :CustomPath2 , :CustomPath3 , :PolicyPath , :SortingNo , :Comment , :CreatedMemberNo , SYSDATE);
UPDATE "RepositoryFile" SET "DependencyID" = :TargetDependencyID WHERE "RepositoryID" = :RepositoryID AND "DependencyID" = :SourceDependencyID AND NVL(:ItemID, "ItemID") = :ItemID;

UPDATE "RepositoryFile" SET "FileName" = :FileName, "PhysicalPath" = REPLACE("PhysicalPath", "FileName", :FileName), "AbsolutePath" = REPLACE("AbsolutePath", "FileName", :FileName), "RelativePath" = REPLACE("RelativePath", "FileName", :FileName) WHERE "RepositoryID" = :RepositoryID AND "ItemID" = :ItemID;
